glossary.title: Cluster
glossary.description: A set of machines, called nodes, that run containerized applications managed by Kubernetes.
glossary.info: A cluster has several worker nodes and at least one master node.

glossary.title: Container runtime interface (CRI)
glossary.description: The container runtime interface (CRI) is an an API for container runtimes to integrate with kubelet on a node.
glossary.info: For more information, see the CRI API and specifications.
